channel.title: Hugo Test Site.
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Test Site.

item.title: Commands
item.description: sudo apt install hugo hugo version hugo new site hugo -f “yaml” cd hugo/ git init git branch -m main git submodule add https://github.com/vantagedesign/ace-documentation.git themes/acedoc hugo new posts/welcome.md hugo server -D git commit -m"first commit" git remote add origin https://github.com/trulede/hugo.git git push -u origin main mkdir -p .github/workflows touch .github/workflows/gh-pages.yaml hugo new posts/commands.md
